name: github
title: GitHub
description: Provides commands for viewing and interacting with GitHub resources
author: jclem

commands.name: codespaces
commands.title: Codespaces
commands.subtitle: Open and control GitHub Codespaces
commands.description: This command provides a way to search and interact with your GitHub Codespaces

commands.name: search-code
commands.title: Search Code
commands.subtitle: Search code on GitHub
commands.description: This command provides a way to search code on GitHub

commands.name: search-commits
commands.title: Search Commits
commands.subtitle: Search git commits on GitHub
commands.description: This command provides a way to search git commits on GitHub

commands.name: search-issues
commands.title: Search Issues & PRs
commands.subtitle: Search issues and pull requests on GitHub
commands.description: This command provides a way to search issues and pull requests on GitHub

commands.name: manage-favorites
commands.title: Manage Favorite Repos
commands.subtitle: Browse, add and remove GitHub repos from your list of favorites
commands.description: This command provides a way to browse, add, and remove repos from your list of favorites

commands.name: search-repos
commands.title: Search Repositories
commands.subtitle: Search repositories on GitHub
commands.description: This command provides a way to search repositories on GitHub

commands.name: search-users
commands.title: Search Users
commands.subtitle: Search users on GitHub
commands.description: This command provides a way to search users on GitHub

preferences.name: pat
preferences.title: Personal Access Token
preferences.description: A personal access token with access to your GitHub resources used by this extension
